text: hi everyone its Alan here today are we
making soy by MO or Vietnamese three
color sticky rice it's a super
eye-catching and colorful dish that is
only made from natural ingredients
without any food coloring the three
colors are red yellow and green and the
color red is made from Wagga is a very
special spiky orange fruit that is more
easy to find in Vietnam the flashing
sidewalk is bloody red and it's very
high in antioxidants super rich in
vitamin A good for your eye and skin it
also helps to reduce the risk of heart
disease tumors and cancer outside
Vietnam you can buy the in red flash and
frozen or in a cane at Asian grocery
store the sticky rice cooked with duck
food or so ago coz this is a beautiful
red color and because the color red
symbolizes good luck and happiness in
Vietnamese culture so luck is served as
many special occasions and such as
engagement weddings or Vietnamese new
year day engagements or weddings is
normally molded in heart shape and it
can be served playing with Vietnamese
ham yellow or roasted chicken the yellow
layer is made from money being paid very
popular feelings for many Vietnamese
cakes and the green layer is colored and
flavored with pandan leaves if you want
to make something fancy on special
occasions like anniversary or New Year's
Day it might be a good idea
you can also mode the sticky rice in
heart shape to give to the special
someone on their birthday or Valentine's
Day
so I hope you're gonna like it and let's
begin recipes firstly wash the stick
your eyes a few times until the water
become clear and then soak in water for
at least 1 hour or better overnight then
drain off the excess water and toss it
with a quarter teaspoon of salt this is
a package of cut fruit that I bought a
patient store is called memorial fruit
in English place the red flash in a bowl
and add 2 tbsp cooking wine you can also
use whiskey or red wine the alcohol will
help remove the flesh from the cyst and
also make it the red color to a more
vibrant wear on gloves and get your
hands in there squeeze and massage
disease to remove the red flesh from the
stones the color is really crazy is so
red just like blood mmm
I think I have an idea for next year
Halloween he I said for the color this
fruit is quite playing it's very healthy
but actually doesn't have much taste you
can remove the stone and I just want to
keep some to show authenticity then
gently mix the gut fruit with the sticky
rice after soaking the sticky rice is
very fresher so you want to be very
gentle with this ok there are three ways
to cook sticky rice the most rational
way is to steam it we cut it home soy or
soy to set up the steamer filled the
large pot with some water and place a
steamer basket into it to prevent the
sticky rice from slipping through the
holes of the similar basket light it
with a piece of banana leaf if you don't
have banana leaf a piece of baking or
parchment paper will do the trick then
transfer the sticky rice onto the
steamer basket make a hole in the center
so the steam can distribute evenly cover
and steam for about 20 to 40 minutes
the type of sticky rice you use and also
the amount halfway through the cooking
you chopsticks to fluff the rice so that
it can be cooked evenly the sticky rice
is cooked when this turns quite
translucent and is very soft when you
taste it
if you cook sticky rice in smaller
volumes like one to two cups it's faster
to use a microwave or rice cooker in
that case after mixing the rice with the
little gut fruit you can add water or
coconut milk just enough to barely cover
the rice it's very important that you
don't have too much liquid because the
garage doesn't taste good when it's wet
or soggy so make sure the liquid level
is just the same at the rice level then
transfer to a rice cooker and press the
cook button like normal if you use a
microwave cover and microwave for five
minutes then take out and flood the rice
with chopsticks then cover and microwave
for another three to seven minutes
depending on the kind of rice and volume
when the sticky rice is cooked add a few
tablespoons of sugar depending on your
taste and one or two teaspoon of
vegetable oil to make it look more shiny
to prepare the yellow layer wash mung
beans a few times until the water become
clear then soak it in water over at
least one hour transfer to a rice cooker
add water just enough to barely cover
the beans and cook line normal you can
also cook on the stove for about 15 to
20 minutes until soft then you food
processor a spoon or spatula to mash
into a paste add sugar and mix well
until well combined the green layer is
coconut painting sticky rice I already
